title: Mattress Reviewers at Sleepopolis Launch in the United Kingdom
text:
Mattress and sleep product reviewers at Sleepopolis have launched in the United Kingdom.
Scottsdale, Arizona (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
Mattress and sleep product reviewers at Sleepopolis have launched in the United Kingdom. Sleepopolis.co.uk , like its sister site in the United States, will provide expert level research, analysis, and advice on the best sleep products.
Sleepopolis is an independent, unbiased reviewer that launched in the United States September, 2014. Since launch, Sleepopolis has gained strong readership by providing detailed, unbiased, and helpful reviews on many of the most popular online mattress companies and other sleep products.
Founder of Sleepopolis, Derek Hales, has “made it [his] goal to help sleepers find a great night’s sleep at a fair price, no matter where they live.” Hales wants to take the mystery and confusion out of buying a mattress.
“Buying a new mattress shouldn’t be difficult or confusing, but too often it simply is,” Hales said.
Sleepopolis’ United Kingdom division will research, analyze, and test mattresses and other sleep products available in the United Kingdom. The first two UK mattress tests are already live, featuring UK start-up Eve Sleep and US-based Leesa Sleep, who have recently expanded to the UK. Future reviews, including Tempur’s popular Cloud 22 model, are already planned.
As Hales says, “Sleepopolis’ mission is simplehelp my readers discover, understand, and select a mattress that meets and exceeds all of their needs and desires at a reasonable price.”
About Sleepopolis
Sleepopolis is an independent, unbiased website that researches, analyzes, and reviews mattresses and other sleep products. The Sleepopolis mission is simple; help sleepers discover, understand, and select mattresses and other sleep products that meet and exceed their needs. Sleepopolis founder Derek Hales has personally tested dozens of the most popular mattresses. For help with finding the best mattresses and other sleep products visit sleepopolis-mattress-reviews.com and sleepopolis.co.uk .
